section.title: Verify the Installation
section.para: You can run these commands from the proxy server or any server with access to the Identity Service. Look for the default_swift_cluster setting in the proxy-server.conf and match the URLs (including http or https) when issuing auth commands.

listitem.para: Run the swift CLI, swift, with the correct Identity service URL.
Check that you can HEAD the account:
Check that the Swift Tool, swift, works:
Use swift to upload a few files named ‘bigfile[1-2].tgz’ to a container named ‘myfiles’:

para.literallayout: swift -A http://<AUTH_HOSTNAME>:8080/auth/v1.0 -U system:root -K testpass upload myfiles bigfile1.tgz swift -A http://<AUTH_HOSTNAME>:8080/auth/v1.0 -U system:root -K testpass upload myfiles bigfile2.tgz

listitem.para: Use swift to download all files from the ‘myfiles’ container:

para.literallayout: swift -A http://<AUTH_HOSTNAME>:8080/auth/v1.0 -U system:root -K testpass download myfiles
